name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior GTM Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing robust APIs and automation tools to enhance Go-To-Market strategies. Proficient in **Python** for backend development, leveraging frameworks such as **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Flask**, alongside a solid foundation in **JavaScript**. Skilled in utilizing cloud platforms such as **AWS** and **Azure** to build scalable solutions. Strong expertise in process improvement and data-driven decision making, contributing to successful integrations with tools like **Salesforce**, **HubSpot**, and **Common Room**. Demonstrated ability to deliver impactful solutions at industry leaders, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **JavaScript** to enhance backend services that support internal tools for go-to-market (GTM) strategies, focusing on process improvement and data-driven decisions.
Engineered API integrations with **HubSpot**, **Salesforce**, and **Common Room** to optimize data exchange and reporting capabilities, improving efficiency by **30%** in user onboarding.
Developed automation workflows using **Make** to streamline marketing processes, resulting in a **25%** reduction in time spent on manual tasks.
Analyzed and improved GTM processes through collaboration with cross-functional teams, delivering insights that drive strategy adjustments based on data analysis and performance metrics.
Implemented robust data solutions and pipelines using **SQL** for reporting and analytics, ensuring accurate and timely insights into sales performance.
Led the integration efforts with third-party tools like **Clay** to enhance user engagement and community management, positively impacting user retention by **15%**.
Ensured security and compliance in all integrations by adopting best practices and standards, enhancing system reliability and user trust.

• Designed and implemented data-driven solutions within backend systems utilizing **Python** and **FastAPI** to enhance workflow automation, focusing on user onboarding with a **20%** decrease in onboarding time.
• Developed event-driven microservices leveraging **Celery** and **Redis** for asynchronous processing of financial data, significantly improving transaction processing time by **30%**.
• Executed deployment strategies for microservices on **Azure App Services**, utilizing **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, consistently maintaining scalable environments across **3** major product releases.
• Engineered robust data pipelines for the secure exchange of regulatory data with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, optimizing data flow processes and enhancing regulatory compliance.
• Conducted thorough security audits and ensured compliance with industry standards, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for efficient authentication and secure access controls.
• Collaborated extensively with cross-functional teams to ensure effective system integration, process improvements, and successful release management for the deployment of **5** critical updates.

Utilized **Python** and **JavaScript** to develop robust backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, increasing trading operation efficiency by **30%**.
Engineered real-time price feed processors employing **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** to provide up-to-the-second trading data, enhancing the performance for high-frequency transactions by **25%**.
Collaborated with frontend teams to effectively deliver data through well-designed **REST APIs** and **WebSocket channels**, ensuring seamless user interaction across the platform, achieving a user satisfaction rate of **95%**.
Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while upholding internal data security protocols to safeguard sensitive user information.
Implemented comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes, which reduced bug rates in production by **40%**.
Introduced scheduling and job queuing solutions utilizing **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and enhancing process management efficiency.

skills:

	Python (3.8+), SQL, JavaScript

	FastAPI, Flask, Django, Celery

**API Technologies**
	REST/gRPC APIs, APIs

**Cloud & Infrastructure**
	AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Azure

	PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis

	Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, CI/CD, Git

**Other**
	AI/ML Tools: Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Airflow, MLflow, Microservices, Kafka, process improvement, data-driven, GTM, Clay, Common Room, HubSpot, Salesforce, Make
